db7b3426781854f492c1ba2427abe660a4c2b58a.commitMessage:
Corrected compilation errors reported by today's GUMP run which were
caused by a few references to Avalon Excalibur's IO FileUtil class
(introduced during recent addition of its functionality).

Nothing but goodness can come from the merger of these two classes;
hopefully Avalon will eventually adopt Commons IO's FileUtils,
wrapping their old interface around this class (and possibly
deprecating it).
